verses.verse: And it came to pass,<WH1961> when Jabin<WH2985> king<WH4428> of Hazor<WH2674> had heard<WH8085> those things, that he sent<WH7971> to<WH413> Jobab<WH3103> king<WH4428> of Madon,<WH4068> and to<WH413> the king<WH4428> of Shimron,<WH8110> and to<WH413> the king<WH4428> of Achshaph,<WH407>

And to<WH413> the kings<WH4428> that<WH834> were on the north<WH4480> <WH6828> of the mountains,<WH2022> and of the plains<WH6160> south<WH5045> of Chinneroth,<WH3672> and in the valley,<WH8219> and in the borders<WH5299> of Dor<WH1756> on the west,<WH4480> <WH3220>

And to the Canaanite<WH3669> on the east<WH4480> <WH4217> and on the west,<WH4480> <WH3220> and to the Amorite,<WH567> and the Hittite,<WH2850> and the Perizzite,<WH6522> and the Jebusite<WH2983> in the mountains,<WH2022> and to the Hivite<WH2340> under<WH8478> Hermon<WH2768> in the land<WH776> of Mizpeh.<WH4709>

And they went out,<WH3318> they<WH1992> and all<WH3605> their hosts<WH4264> with<WH5973> them, much<WH7227> people,<WH5971> even as the sand<WH2344> that<WH834> is upon<WH5921> the sea<WH3220> shore<WH8193> in multitude,<WH7230> with horses<WH5483> and chariots<WH7393> very<WH3966> many.<WH7227>

And when all<WH3605> these<WH428> kings<WH4428> were met together,<WH3259> they came<WH935> and pitched<WH2583> together<WH3162> at<WH413> the waters<WH4325> of Merom,<WH4792> to fight<WH3898> against<WH5973> Israel.<WH3478>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Joshua,<WH3091> Be not<WH408> afraid<WH3372> because of<WH4480> <WH6440> them: for<WH3588> tomorrow<WH4279> about this<WH2063> time<WH6256> will I<WH595> deliver them up<WH5414> <WH853> all<WH3605> slain<WH2491> before<WH6440> Israel:<WH3478> thou shalt hamstring<WH6131> <WH853> their horses,<WH5483> and burn<WH8313> their chariots<WH4818> with fire.<WH784>

So Joshua<WH3091> came,<WH935> and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> of war<WH4421> with<WH5973> him, against<WH5921> them by<WH5921> the waters<WH4325> of Merom<WH4792> suddenly;<WH6597> and they fell<WH5307> upon them.

And the LORD<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> them into the hand<WH3027> of Israel,<WH3478> who smote<WH5221> them, and chased<WH7291> them unto<WH5704> great<WH7227> Zidon,<WH6721> and unto<WH5704> Misrephoth-maim,<WH4956> and unto<WH5704> the valley<WH1237> of Mizpeh<WH4708> eastward;<WH4217> and they smote<WH5221> them, until<WH5704> they left<WH7604> them none<WH1115> remaining.<WH8300>
And Joshua<WH3091> did<WH6213> unto them as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> bade<WH559> him: he hamstrung<WH6131> <WH853> their horses,<WH5483> and burnt<WH8313> their chariots<WH4818> with fire.<WH784>

And Joshua<WH3091> at that<WH1931> time<WH6256> turned back,<WH7725> and took<WH3920> <WH853> Hazor,<WH2674> and smote<WH5221> the king<WH4428> thereof with the sword:<WH2719> for<WH3588> Hazor<WH2674> formerly<WH6440> was the head<WH7218> of all<WH3605> those<WH428> kingdoms.<WH4467>

And they smote<WH5221> <WH853> all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that<WH834> were therein with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> utterly destroying<WH2763> them: there was not<WH3808> any<WH3605> left<WH3498> to breathe:<WH5397> and he burnt<WH8313> Hazor<WH2674> with fire.<WH784>

And all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> of those<WH428> kings,<WH4428> and all<WH3605> the kings<WH4428> of them, did Joshua<WH3091> take,<WH3920> and smote<WH5221> them with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and he utterly destroyed<WH2763> them, as<WH834> Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD<WH3068> commanded.<WH6680>

But <WH7535> as for the cities<WH5892> that stood still<WH5975> in<WH5921> their strength,<WH8510> Israel<WH3478> burned<WH8313> none<WH3808> of them, save<WH2108> <WH853> Hazor<WH2674> only;<WH905> that did Joshua<WH3091> burn.<WH8313>

And all<WH3605> the spoil<WH7998> of these<WH428> cities,<WH5892> and the cattle,<WH929> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> took for a prey<WH962> unto themselves; but<WH7535> <WH853> every<WH3605> man<WH120> they smote<WH5221> with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> until<WH5704> they had destroyed<WH8045> them, neither<WH3808> left<WH7604> they any<WH3605> to breathe.<WH5397>

As <WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> <WH853> Moses<WH4872> his servant,<WH5650> so<WH3651> did Moses<WH4872> command<WH6680> <WH853> Joshua,<WH3091> and so<WH3651> did<WH6213> Joshua;<WH3091> he left nothing undone<WH3808> <WH5493> <WH1697> of all<WH4480> <WH3605> that<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> <WH853> Moses.<WH4872>

So Joshua<WH3091> took<WH3947> <WH853> all<WH3605> that<WH2063> land,<WH776> the hills,<WH2022> and all<WH3605> the south country,<WH5045> and all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Goshen,<WH1657> and the valley,<WH8219> and the plain,<WH6160> and the mountain<WH2022> of Israel,<WH3478> and the valley<WH8219> of the same;

Even from<WH4480> the mount<WH2022> Halak,<WH2510> that goeth up<WH5927> to Seir,<WH8165> even unto<WH5704> Baal-gad<WH1171> in the valley<WH1237> of Lebanon<WH3844> under<WH8478> mount<WH2022> Hermon:<WH2768> and all<WH3605> their kings<WH4428> he took,<WH3920> and smote<WH5221> them, and slew<WH4191> them.
Joshua <WH3091> made<WH6213> war<WH4421> a long<WH7227> time<WH3117> with<WH854> all<WH3605> those<WH428> kings.<WH4428>

There was<WH1961> not<WH3808> a city<WH5892> that<WH834> made peace<WH7999> with<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> save<WH1115> the Hivites<WH2340> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Gibeon:<WH1391> <WH853> all<WH3605> other they took<WH3947> in battle.<WH4421>

For <WH3588> it was<WH1961> of<WH4480> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> to harden<WH2388> <WH853> their hearts,<WH3820> that they should come against<WH7125> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> in battle,<WH4421> that<WH4616> he might destroy<WH2763> them utterly, and that they might have<WH1961> no<WH1115> favor,<WH8467> but<WH3588> that<WH4616> he might destroy<WH8045> them, as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> <WH853> Moses.<WH4872>

And at that<WH1931> time<WH6256> came<WH935> Joshua,<WH3091> and cut off<WH3772> <WH853> the Anakims<WH6062> from<WH4480> the mountains,<WH2022> from<WH4480> Hebron,<WH2275> from<WH4480> Debir,<WH1688> from<WH4480> Anab,<WH6024> and from all<WH4480> <WH3605> the mountains<WH2022> of Judah,<WH3063> and from all<WH4480> <WH3605> the mountains<WH2022> of Israel:<WH3478> Joshua<WH3091> destroyed<WH2763> them utterly with<WH5973> their cities.<WH5892>

There was none<WH3808> of the Anakims<WH6062> left<WH3498> in the land<WH776> of the children<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> only<WH7535> in Gaza,<WH5804> in Gath,<WH1661> and in Ashdod,<WH795> there remained.<WH7604>

So Joshua<WH3091> took<WH3947> <WH853> the whole<WH3605> land,<WH776> according to all<WH3605> that<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> said<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses;<WH4872> and Joshua<WH3091> gave<WH5414> it for an inheritance<WH5159> unto Israel<WH3478> according to their divisions<WH4256> by their tribes.<WH7626> And the land<WH776> rested<WH8252> from war.<WH4480> <WH4421>
